       This report was prepared by a team led by Paul
     Isenman and comprising Nicholas Hope, Timothy King,
     Peter Knight, Akbar Noman, Rupert Pennant-Rea and
     Adrian Wood. The Economic Analysis and Projections
     Department prepared the data and projections used in
     Chapter 2 and in the World Development Indicators.
     The authors would like to acknowledge the substantial
     help received from many contributors, reviewers and
     support staff. The work was carried out under the general
     direction of Bevan Waide and Hollis Chenery.
